title: Stones River National Battlefield: Plants
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants               Plants          Besides being one of the main components of the numerous communities in the park, plants are one of the key features of the cultural landscapes at Stones River National Battlefield.National Park Service employees and researchers continue to search the park for new plant species while monitioring the health of plant communities to ensure these valuable resources are preserved for future generations.Vascular Plant Community Classification for Stones River National Battlefield  Â    USGS Vegetation Characterization Program Information for Stones River National Battlefield (includes Vegetation Map)
